thread.title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X with Snapdragon 625 SoC and 4,100mAh battery goes official
thread.title_full: Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X with Snapdragon 625 SoC and 4,100mAh battery goes official

title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X with Snapdragon 625 SoC and 4,100mAh battery goes official
text:
Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X with Snapdragon 625 SoC and 4,100mAh battery goes... Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X with Snapdragon 625 SoC and 4,100mAh battery goes official By February 8, 2017 “The Redmi Note 4X goes on sale in China this Valentine’s Day” 
Xiaomi has officially announced the Redmi Note 4X smartphone in its home market of China. The brand has only revealed a couple of key specs of the Redmi Note 4X at the moment. The complete specs of the handset will be unveiled on February 14th when it will go on sale in China. 
Similar to its predecessor, the Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X features a metal unibody design and a fingerprint sensor that’s located at its rear. The phone flaunts a large 5.5-inch full HD display, and is powered by an octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 625 processor. It comes with a 13-megapixel primary snapper and a 5-megapixel secondary shooter. The device is fuelled by a beefy 4,100mAh battery. We will have its full specs and pricing details on the Valentine’s Day. 
As per the reports, the Redmi Note 4X will be available in three configurations. The 2GB RAM + 32GB storage model will be available for RMB 999 (~Rs 9,700), the 3GB RAM + 32GB ROM for RMB 1,099 (~Rs 10,700) and the 4GB RAM + 64GB storage for RMB 1,299 (~Rs 12,700). It comes in five hues including Champagne Gold, Platinum Silver, Matte Black, Cherry Pink and Hatsune Green. Facebook Comments
